original_text: When God turned away from Israel's people, he then accepted other people in the world as his friends. So, when God does accept Israel's people, the result will be even better! It will be like dead people who have become alive again! When God turned away from Israel's people, he then accepted other people in the world as his friends. So, when God does accept Israel's people, the result will be even better! It will be like dead people who have become alive again!
korean_text: 그들을 버리는 것이 세상의 화목이 되거든 그 받아들이는 것이 죽은 자 가운데서 살아나는 것이 아니면 무엇이리요

sentences.original_text: When God turned away from Israel's people
he then accepted other people in the world as his friends
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 세상의 다른 사람들을 친구로 받아들이셨다

sentences.original_text: So, when God does accept Israel's people
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 하나님이 이스라엘 백성을 받아들이실 때

sentences.original_text: the result will be even better
It will be like dead people who have become alive again
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 죽었던 사람들이 다시 살아난 것과 같을 것이다

sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 하나님이 이스라엘 백성을 받아들이실 때

It will be like dead people who have become alive again
